page.title: 07LIFE IN NOTTINGHAM(SNEINTON)
page.content: My mum cooks lovely dinners for us: chapattis, kebabs, pakoras, and fish and chips.I like everything but not cauliflower.Mum makes it too hot with chilli.My dad likes it.We live on Sedgley Avenue and I like it because I can walk to school quickly and to the shops and to the youth club at weekends.I play cricket and football. My grandad came on the airplane from Pakistan and he is staying for four months.I talk to him in Urdu but I am teaching him English.He knows the days of the week and 'ta-ra.'
